about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the python bindings.

name: python-lalpulsar
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.17.8
# ------------------------------------------------

package:

    version: 1.17.1

    noarch: false
    number: '1'
    script: install-python.sh
    string: py27h3010b51_1

        - swig 3.0.12 hf484d3e_1003

        - asn1crypto 0.24.0 py27_1003
        - astropy 2.0.12 py27h14c3975_0

        - idna 2.8 py27_1000
        - ipaddress 1.0.22 py_1
        - lal 6.19.2 h7e9c209_1
        - lalpulsar 1.17.1 h7724fef_1
        - libffi 3.2.1 hf484d3e_1005
        - libgcc-ng 7.3.0 hdf63c60_0
        - libgfortran-ng 7.2.0 hdf63c60_3
        - libstdcxx-ng 7.3.0 hdf63c60_0
        - ligo-common 1.0.3 py_0
        - ligo-segments 1.2.0 py27h14c3975_0
        - lscsoft-glue 1.60.0 py27h14c3975_1

        - numpy 1.9.3 py27_blas_openblash1522bff_1207
        - openblas 0.3.3 h9ac9557_1001

        - pyopenssl 19.0.0 py27_0
        - pytest 3.6.4 py27_0
        - python 2.7.15 h721da81_1008

        - python-lal 6.19.2 py27h3010b51_1

        - astropy

test:
    imports:
        - lalpulsar
        - lalpulsar.NstarTools

        - lalpulsar.simulateCW
about:
    description: 'The LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library for gravitational wave data analysis.

extra:

The LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
